TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProcessInputEventHandler(object sender, ProcessInputEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProcessInputEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProcessInputEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProcessInputEventArgs)
public delegate void ProcessInputEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProcessInputEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: Rappresenta il metodo che gestir√† l'evento .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il viene utilizzato con il evento.The is used with the event. Abilitano l'accesso a elaborare gli eventi di input di area di gestione temporanea, che elabora l'input in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] eventi.Process input events enable access to the staging area, which processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] events. L'input viene elaborato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nelle seguenti fasi:Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. Fase di pre-elaborazione.Pre-process stage. I gestore di input genera il evento.The input manager raises the event. 2. Fase di pre-notifica.Pre-notify stage. I gestore di input genera il evento.The input manager raises the event. 3. Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] vengono generati l'evento di input o eventi.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. Post-fase di notifica.Post-notify stage. I gestore di input genera il evento.The input manager raises the event. 5. Fase di post-elaborazione.Post-process stage. I gestore di input genera il evento.The input manager raises the event.
